snippet.title: Government Simulator 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
On Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/1930680/
Website: http://www.ambieragames.com/government-simulator2/

Government Simulator 2 is a is a simple economic and political simulation game based on real-world data and the successor to "Government Simulator" with a modernized simulation engine and more features. Take control of a whole country, like the USA, Germany, France, Russia, or Austria. Change laws, taxes and budgets based on real world statistics and data, and see what happens.
